title: Adobe CS3 Master Collection for pretty cheap :-)
content:
Hello fellow typophiles!

For those of you guys who are looking for a cheap copy of a retail unopened box of the Adobe CS3 Master Collection, i’m currently selling a copy of the Adobe CS3 master collection for a very discounted price on ebay.

If you guys are interested, please check out the following auction link:  
 [http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051703/http:/cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&item=110279768800 "http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&item=110279768800")

If you guys have any questions, let me know through this thread and i’ll answer them as soon as i get to them :-)

Thank you guys!

 [‹ Perfectly Kerning Helvetica?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051703/http:/typophile.com/node/48399 "Go to previous forum topic") [How to use Avant Garde ligatures? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051703/http:/typophile.com/node/48242 "Go to next forum topic")
author: indiochano
